text: God gos ne anɨgɨl mɨdeb, nɨbi ñapay ne teplep yɨbɨl yenɨmɨb. Binɨb suŋtep takaw ma mɨdeb okok mɨdɨl, tap tɨmel olap nab nɨbi ma yenɨmɨb. Pen takaw pel mɨdep ak kɨles gɨl dɨnɨmɨb ak nɨm, gap pogɨlɨn wɨsɨp alaŋ mɨlek gup tek yenɨgabɨm, binɨb lum awl nab okok. Binɨb anɨb okok, kɨli gɨtep gep ak kelɨgɨl, pel gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨpal. Anɨb ak tek, tap okok mɨdupsek gɨnɨgabɨm ak, kɨmɨgel mɨdɨl gɨnɨmɨb. Takaw kuŋay ma agɨl, takaw penpen ma agɨnɨmɨb. Anɨgenɨgabɨm, Klays adɨkɨd ownɨgab ñɨn ak, nɨbi gɨtep gɨpɨm ak gos nɨgen yɨp tep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab. Pen yad anɨb nɨgɨnɨgayn, wog awl nɨbop nab okok gɨtep gɨpin ak, yokɨp ma gɨpin. Takaw apin anɨb anep dɨpɨm.
